channel.title: Downloads?
channel.description:
Well I want to download some stuff,and most is on rapidshare or megaupload and can only download 1part for like every 3hrs...which is going to take forever for what I want to download..So asking is there away to bypass the wait time without being a premium member on them?Or anyone know a direct download site for good quality dvd movies//pc games..
And not torrent please,unless its a really good torrent site beside Demonoid.

item.title: Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

isohunt.com…?

Read full topic

item.title: Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:120187”]There used to be a way you could bypass it by changing the url to think you are a premium user, but they fixed that .

On the occasion, I find a premium link converter that actually works, but gets shut down in merely days. Your best bet is paying for an account (which I doubt you will), or just actually buying the game :/[/quote]

I would rather not buy an account, since I am likely only going to use it for a few things,and the game itself is just a play me once type of game for me, If it was a game I would love, then of course I’d buy it,and I have gooogled this alot.Just as you said I can find premium link generators but they never work and I have tried all those methods mentioned above except the injecting javascript but I will try it

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:

I think they fixed injecting javascript, but I’ll try that again the next time I need to download something.

item.title: Downloads?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

There used to be a way you could bypass it by changing the url to think you are a premium user, but they fixed that .

On the occasion, I find a premium link converter that actually works, but gets shut down in merely days. Your best bet is paying for an account (which I doubt you will), or just actually buying the game

Read full topic
